sub_title: Head of Ship Management @ Commander Surface Combattants
summary:
Helping naval units to get and keep their Ship Management up to standard is what I do. 
Having years of experience on board both submarines and surface units, and plenty of common sense, enable me to find a fitting solution to every challenge.
My skills as leadership trainer, and team/personal coach and Crew Resource Management instructor can make a difference in any organization.

profile_positions.description:
Helping naval units to get and keep their Ship Management up to standard.
Involved in composing educational qualification profiles. 
Participating in several MoD and Navy working groups.
profile_positions.title: Head of Ship Management @ Commander Surface Combattants

profile_positions.description:
1. Providing leadership training (Situational Leadership II, DISC profiles and Belbin teamroles) for max 12 persons (2 days sessions). All petty officers and officers are to follow this mandatory training every 3 years.
2. Leadership trainer is not my primary job in the Royal Netherlands Navy.
3. I was trained by Blanchard International and CMB (Belbin Masterclass by Rob Groen)
profile_positions.title: Leadership trainer

profile_positions.description:
Leading 35 instructors & staff. 

Educating up to 550 recruits during their initial training for the Royal Netherlands Navy.

Providing year round trainingweeks for civilian students of different regional colleges (with majors in Maritime and Mechatronica). These students are being prepared for military jobs. Upon graduation they receive a reduction in the duration of Navy job specific courses, necessary before going to sea a first time.

profile_positions.description:
Advising the commanding officer on deployment of weapon systems * Coordinating deployment of sensors and weapon systems * Evaluating results and writing reports * Cooperating with other units * Ensuring safety during exercises and operations

Leading a division of up to 24 persons * Preparing and executing operations * Conducting briefings and evaluations * Quality control * Managing personnel

Executing practice/training programs * Creating practice and training programs * Supervising the program execution.

volunteer_experiences.description: CSH organises every year in november the entry of Saint Nicholas in the pretty village Hurdegaryp, with festivities on the village square and in the local theatre.

De Wissel serves as a meeting-point for people of all ages. From a professional copy service to courses in developping your talents in painting, De Wissel provides the opportunity to all citizens of my village.
De OudePeterLoop is een kleinschalig hardloopevenement voor kinderen en volwassenen. Het wordt 2x per jaar gehouden in Hardegarijp, op de laatste zaterdag in juni en december.
